item.title: Hugo Guide
item.description: About Contents Add Some Content hugo new post/**.md The newly created content file will start with something like this: --- title: "**" date: 2019-03-26T08:47:11+01:00 draft: true --- Drafts do not get deployed; once you finish a post, update the header of the post to say draft: false. More info here. --- title: "Hugo Guide" date: 2021-05-01T08:47:11+01:00 categories: ["Manual"] tags: ["Hugo", "GitHub"] draft: false --- Add pictures /post/xxx.jpg is actually baseURL/post/xxx.jpg

item.title: Math
item.description: $$ e^{ix}=\text{cos}x+i\text{sin}x $$ $$ \left(C_{n+1, t+1}-C_{n, t}\right)-\left(C_{n, t+1}-C_{n-1, t}\right)=\frac{2}{n+1} $$ æ¢è¡Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨\\\\ $$ \begin{aligned} C_{n+1, t+1}-C_{n, t} &=\frac{2}{n+1}+\frac{2}{n}+\cdots+\frac{2}{t+2} +C_{t+1, t+1}-C_{t, t} \\ &=2\left(H_{n+1}-H_{t+1}\right)+2-2 /(t+1) \end{aligned} $$ \begin{aligned} C_{n+1, t+1}-C_{n, t} &=\frac{2}{n+1}+\frac{2}{n}+\cdots+\frac{2}{t+2} +C_{t+1, t+1}-C_{t, t} \\\\ &=2\left(H_{n+1}-H_{t+1}\right)+2-2 /(t+1) \end{aligned} \begin{aligned}å’Œ\end{aligned}ä¹‹é—´ä¸èƒ½æœ‰ç©ºè¡Œ ä¸æ”¯æŒ\left[ï¼Œ\right)ç­‰
